title: Divisional Round preview & who is to blame in Pittsburgh?
itunes:title: Divisional Round preview & who is to blame in Pittsburgh?
description:
Dave Dameshek heads to the green screen room to kibitz with Maurice Jones-Drew before the Divisional Round games. MJD breaks down his Rams hosting the Dallas Cowboys and why he believes after the bye, Los Angeles will take care of business at home (2:15). Next, MJD and Shek talk about why they believe the Chargers can win in Foxboro, especially with Hunter Henry returning (13:15). Then, Maurice makes the bold prediction that the Eagles with Nick Foles now will go down to New Orleans and pull out the victory (18:00). Lastly, Shek and MJD debate who is to blame in Pittsburgh for the latest drama - Antonio Brown, Ben Roethlisberger or Mike Tomlin (22:00)?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
